basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Mark Maddy Endowed Memorial Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Mark Maddy Endowed Memorial

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate or graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be admitted to the Teacher Ed program or degree seeking M.Ed in Secondary Ed program at UCO Preference will be given to music education applicants Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Music Education-Instrumental   and SIS_Major is Music Education-Vocal   and SIS_Major is Secondary Education   and SIS_Major is Music Education-Music Educ
